"Don't worry Ice, We'll be going back. Striker was my friend. I will 
have Slayers head." He wasn't sure just how he'd find them but he was 
sure that Slayer would stain his claws once again.



Veratis studied the CR Chamber results since Lunarpines return. There 
was DNA on Lunarpines claws that didn't belong to him. From the looks 
of things it was another wolf.(Slayer) Now Veratis had DNA from three 
different wolves. He wondered what would happen if all three were 
injected into one being. He already had one problem to deal with so 
he didn't try.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She sighed. She knew his sence of honor and how he funtioned. She 
was 
> very much like him in that respect. "I understand. We must pay back 
> the debt we owe before helping our friends." she lowered her head. 
> She hate being torn between friendship and honor.  
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Far as I know the other maximals survived." He couldn't give her 
a 
> > deffinite answer. "I don't know thier situation, I had to much to 
> > think about to worry about them."  He sensed her worry even 
without 
> > telepathic powers. "Veratis needs us right now, we can't worry 
> about 
> > the Maximals at the moment." We owe him your life and my body. 
> Until 
> > we settle the score I'm staying here."
> >
